properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNO, A.* FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO , NICKNAME , NOTICE_TITLE , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE" , COUNT FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER ON (NOTICE_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNO BETWEEN ? AND ?
